com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Interface ILoyaltyManagerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoyaltyManagerFacade

    public interface ILoyaltyManagerFacade
    This defines the operations required to manage loyalty.
    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isRegisteredForLoyalty

        boolean isRegisteredForLoyalty()
        Checks if is registered for loyalty.
        Returns:
        the loyalty registration status.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the error status codes defined in ILoyaltyManagerService.isRegisteredForLoyalty() will be thrown.
        See Also:
        ILoyaltyManagerService.isRegisteredForLoyalty()

      • retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData

        List<LoyaltyProfileData> retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData()
        Retrieve the list of loyalty global profile meta data, that needs to be populated and submitted when registering for loyalty programs.
        Returns:
        the profile meta-data containing the attributes required to populate and submit for loyalty registration
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the error status codes defined in ILoyaltyManagerService.retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData() will be thrown.
        See Also:
        ILoyaltyManagerService.retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData()

      • registerCustomerForLoyalty

        void registerCustomerForLoyalty(List<LoyaltyProfileData> loyaltyProfileDataList)
        Registers the customer for loyalty programs.
        Parameters:
        loyaltyProfileDataList - List of LoyaltyProfileData objects populated with values for the respective data types.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the error status codes defined in ILoyaltyManagerService.registerCustomerForLoyalty(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.loyalty.CustomerProfileDataList) will be thrown.
        E.g.: 
            // Retrieve loyalty profile meta-data
    List<LoyaltyProfileData> loyaltyProfileDataList =  ILoyaltyManagerFacade.retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData();
    
    for(LoyaltyProfileData loyaltyProfileData : loyaltyProfileDataList) {
    
      // set relevant value for the profile data type
      loyaltyProfileData.setProfileDataValue(...);
      
    }
    
    // Register customer
    ILoyaltyManagerFacade.registerCustomerForLoyalty(loyaltyProfileDataList);
        See Also:
        LoyaltyProfileData, ILoyaltyManagerService.registerCustomerForLoyalty(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.loyalty.CustomerProfileDataList)

      • retrieveMyLoyaltyPrograms

        List<LoyaltyProgram> retrieveMyLoyaltyPrograms()
        Retrieve my loyalty programs.
        Returns:
        the loyalty program list
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the error status codes defined in ILoyaltyManagerService.retrieveMyLoyaltyPrograms() will be thrown.
        See Also:
        ILoyaltyManagerService.retrieveMyLoyaltyPrograms()

      • refreshPointsBalance

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the loyalty points balance
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the error status codes defined in ILoyaltyManagerService.refreshPointsBalance(String) will be thrown.
